about_the_game:
Contains consumable items.
1. Promotion GameMoney Gift Card 100
- It is a virtual currency that can be used within the application.
You can use the virtual currency to unlock features in the application, and purchase UI skins and UI sounds.
You can purchase one item per 100 GameMoney.

Promotion GameMoney Gift Card 100 is equivalent to 100 GameMoney Gift Card.

name: NPUnrealSample - GameMoney Pack 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 250
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
